text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews meteorological experts on Cyclone Phalin
text.summary: Wikinews interviews several meteorologists about the prognosis for Cyclone Phailin as it approaches land in the Bay of Bengal at 190 km/h, and the Indian government's preparedness for the storm given past deaths caused by cyclones in the area.
